page.title: 12WHISPERS NIGHT CLUB,HARLOW.
page.content: {WHISPERS}is a disco night club mostly for teenagers,but on Sundays children from 12 years upwards may enter. There are 5 bars,1 cocktail,1 snack and 3 for alcohol and soft drinks. You must be 18 and over to be served alcohol. {WHISPERS}is very decorative in order to attract people to come along.A lot of money has been spent on all the lighting,music centres,sound effects and refreshment facilities.There are also 5 TV sets which show videos of the songs played on the music centres. Before{WHISPERS}opened 1 year ago the previous club was called{TIFFANYS . 7 people are employed full time and daily they make sure everything is clean and tidy. Admission on{Poppers night}(12-16yrs) is Â£1.00.The club opens from 6pm until late!.
